name: Card Game, A Card Game
description:
How to start playing the game

Before starting the game,   the player needs to build a deck

Main Menu

Deck Button

 Building a Deck

Each card contains an 'Effort' value which determines its cost for deck building.  The maximum total cost for a deck is 80. 

Deck Building
A card contains three values and a label. Effort value is located on the upper left of the card and is used for deck building. Attack and Health is located on the left and the right side of the card respectively.  If a card with higher attack battles a lower health card, the latter is defeated. Each card contains a specific ability, which can be seen in the UI when the card is hovered.
Card Layout Win Condition

If a player's deck count reaches below 5, the player loses, leaving the other player the victor. 

Deck Count

Battling

The player should place 5 cards on the battlefield each turn.


Battle

The player has 6 chances to draw at the start. Players can only choose to draw 5. Leftover draws are carried over to the next round.  Every round player receives 6 draw counts.
